title: Chapter 660 - Only A Tribulation Like This Is Worthy Of Su Xuanjun
volume_title: A Sword Suppresses Thirty Thousand Years
body:
Chapter 660 - Only A Tribulation Like This Is Worthy Of Su Xuanjun

Above the Sea of Chaotic Spirits.

The night skies were dark and overcast. The low rumbling of thunder boomed throughout the dome of heaven.

Su Yi stood in midair, drinking as he gazed into the stars, his blue robes fluttering in the ocean winds.

Ning Sihua and the others stood not far away. All of them were gazing into the sky.

The booming thunder was intense, like distant divine mountains slamming into one another. A terrifying, oppressive majesty permeated heaven and earth.

Everyone’s hearts quivered, and they felt suffocated.

“What’s happening?”

“Who knows?”

“The heavens have shifted…”

They conversed amongst themselves, all of them alarmed and uncertain.

“Don’t panic. This is a rare stroke of fortune. Once it starts, how much you can obtain is up to you, though,” Su Yi said leisurely.

He’d long since guessed the reason behind tonight’s unexpected development, and he was aware of the sudden change to the Origins of the Azure. That meant that, before long, the incomparably overflowing source power of the Grand Dao would pour onto the world!

“Fortune?”

The crowd’s eyes lit up with eagerness.

Time slipped by.

Deep within the dome of heaven, the sound of the Grand Dao boomed like thunder, and it only increased...
original_title: Chapter 660 - Only a Tribulation Like This Is Worthy of Su Xuanjun
